10.title: Java/JS developer
10.job_description:
[
We are modern, dynamic, and project-driven company. We are one of the leading providers of information technology and consulting services for business, logistics and distribution. Sluno Ukraine is looking for new team member for position: JAVA/JS — developer Who we are looking for a developer who likes to code and to learn a new or familiar subject area. A developer which can write good readable code, adhering to the existing solution architecture. Able to disassemble someone else’s code. Responsible. Communicative. Gender, age, academic degree, and much more are not important. Desired competencies (any 4 or more options out of the following 8 are sufficient): 
experience in creating enterprise software in Java in a multi-tier architecture 
good knowledge of SQL 
good knowledge and development experience PL/SQL 
experience in creating frontend on JS using any of the popular frameworks 
strong experience using the command line on UNIX 
acquaintance with standard modern technologies of software development and testing 
development experience for MSSQL (including stored procedures) 
experience in developing industrial software in C ++ or C # or Pro*C 
Optional requirements, compliance with which is an undoubted advantage:  
experience in developing / maintaining software for retail or knowledge of the subject area of retail or knowledge of the subject area in warehouse technologies or logistics 

knowledge of any other programming languages/ databases other than those mentioned above 
successful experience in developing enterprise-level software or/and supporting corporate software 
One more mandatory requirement: you must be able to read, write, recognize by ear and speak English at an intermediate level or higher. What does the company offer? 
salary at the market level 
a pleasant microclimate of a small company with European traditions and management 
mandatory business trips to the Czech Republic and Ukraine 
interesting and intensive work, inevitable professional and personal growth 
the possibility to work on a flexible schedule, partially remote work is allowed. 

]

11.title: JavaScript Angular developer (Jun-Middle)
11.job_description:
[
Required Skills: 
Working experience 2 years in web domain
Strong knowledge of JavaScript and TypeScript
Strong knowledge of HTML & CSS
Good knowledge of DOM API and Web APIs
Strong knowledge of Angular Framework. Experience in development of medium/enterprise apps with Angular
Basic knowledge of REST, NodeJS & bash
Good knowledge of Git
Will be a plus: 
Experience of working with build tools such as Webpack & Gulp
Experience in backends development with NodeJS
Basic knowledge of Firebase
Understanding OOP & FP, MVC
Мы предлагаем:
Оплачиваемый отпуск
Возможность гибкого графика
Хороший офис в центре города
Конкурентная оплата труда (вилка зарплаты $1000−1500 (в зависимости от уровня специалиста)
Возможность поработать в хэд оффисе (Гамбург, Германия)
Проект — ведущая платформа, где люди могут находить, предлагать и присоединяться к уникальным поездкам с единомышленниками.
Гибкий график (с 8 до 22 офис открыт)
http://h2h.ltd/angular
]

12.title: Full Stack JavaScript Developer (React & Node.js)
12.job_description:
[
We are a team of innovative thinkers contributing our best to help ideas change the world. How do we do that? We research, create, develop, code and present tailored IT solutions meeting all the requirements of our clients. We are strongly committed to hard work, devotion, responsibility, friendly communication and continuous improvement.We are looking for a Full Stack JS developer to work on various new and interesting projects in a team of highly skilled and motivated people.Requirements:
Strong knowledge of JavaScript (JS)
Experience with React and Node.js (more than 2 year)
Experience with JQuery, HTML / CSS / SASS, Pug / Jade, Webpack / Gulp, Git
Experience with Redux for more than 2 years (will be a plus)
Good knowledge of writing and speaking English 
Ability to find solutions and work in a team
What we offer:
Friendly working environment
Full time, flexible working hours
Office position
Competitive salary
We’ve got a lot of interesting and long lasting projects.
Apply for an interview!
]

13.title: Програміст Frontend/JS

14.title: Junior Full Stack PHP/JS Developer
14.job_description:
[
Мы — небольшая и уютная компания, которая уже более 10 лет на рынке. Разрабатываем сайты, веб и мобильные приложения для стартапов (не интернет-магазины).Ищем в команду Junior Full Stack PHP/JS Developer. Основные требования к кандидату:
Уверенные знания ООП, паттернов проектирования и их применения в PHP;
Опыт работы каким-либо PHP MVC-фреймворком;
Опыт работы с MySQL или MongoDB;
Знания JavaScript, в т.ч. ES6, HTML/CSS.
Что используем, что пригодится и чему сможете научиться:
PHP 7.x (+ алгоритмы, + структуры данных, + ООП, + паттерны проектирования)
MySQL и MongoDB
Laravel, Lumen, Yii2
PHP ML, Blockchain
Git, xDebug, Webpack, Composer, Vagrant, Docker
Elasticsearch, Sphinx
Nginx, PHP-FPM
Node.js, Vue.js, ES6
Jira, Targetprocess, Google Sheets
Условия:
современные технологии (стек выбирают сами разработчики)
проведение код-ревью, менторство опытных коллег
молодой коллектив с лояльным руководством
хорошо налажены процессы, частые ретроспективы
гибкий график
пересмотр условий каждые полгода
курсы английского языка
оплачиваемый 4-недельный отпуск
удобное расположение офиса (м. Площадь Конституции)

]
